title: Add Google Places autocomplete
body_html:
This adds a new SimpleForm input type called "city" which enhances a string input with Google Places powered autocomplete for Cities as explained in #366 .

Loading the required libs from Google and then wiring up an autocomplete field requires an API key. I added one for development (limited to http://localhost:300/) and will add some env variables for staging and production. I cannot really estimate if we'll hit the rate limit for the free plan on my account. Let's just give it a try 🙈

If you like, I can also add the lon/lat thing @carpodaster (it's super straight forward) but I would probably then add a City model to not make the application form more complex than it already is. Would also do this in a separate PR then I guess. Should I?

body:
This adds a new SimpleForm input type called *"city"* which enhances a string input with Google Places powered autocomplete for Cities as explained in #366 .

Loading the required libs from Google and then wiring up an autocomplete field requires an API key. I added one for development *(limited to `http://localhost:300/`)* and will add some env variables for staging and production. I cannot really estimate if we'll hit the rate limit for the free plan on my account. Let's just give it a try 🙈 

If you like, I can also add the lon/lat thing @carpodaster (it's super straight forward) but I would probably then add a `City` model to not make the application form more complex than it already is. Would also do this in a separate PR then I guess. Should I?
